title: Design for Textile
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Foil and tissue paper mounted on heavy white tracing paper; graphite, colored pencil
description: Overlapping small triangles of cut out gold foil and pink, blue, green, purgle and orange tissue papers arranged in semi-horizontal rows
name: Collage
